channel.title: Read this before you make a topic
channel.description:
Countless idiots are making requests, though not really describing what they want. There's a reason [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,196704.0.html]this[/url] sticky is there.
From now on, if your going to request, try and do something like the sticky. Or else the thread will be trashed.
